To make up for this, we would be glad to either replace your meal with the correct order or provide you a refund in full. You will receive a separate message to enter your payment details if you choose the refund. 

Once again, we sincerely apologize for the mix-up and look forward to making it right for you. 

Best Regards,
TastyBytes Customer Support

SUBJECT: Question about Gluten-Free Options at Better Off Bread in London
BODY:
Hello Tasty Bytes Support, 

I am reaching out to inquire about gluten-free options at the Better Off Bread food truck located in London. I am a big fan of your sandwiches, but recently discovered I am gluten-intolerant. I was wondering if you offer gluten-free bread or if there are other modifications that could be made to accommodate my dietary restrictions. 

Thank you for your time, 
James Brown
SUPPORT_RESPONSE:
Hello James,

Thank you for your message and for being such a fan of the Better Off Bread food truck in London. We understand the challenge of finding gluten-friendly food options and we appreciate your patience as we strive to best accommodate our customers' dietary needs.

I'm happy to inform you that indeed, we do offer gluten-free bread at our food trucks. We can substitute the regular bread on any sandwich with our gluten-free option. Also, we offer a number of dishes that are naturally gluten-free, such as our salads and buddha bowls. 

You can feel confident that when you mention your dietary needs to our team when ordering, they will do everything they can to manage any risk of cross-contamination. But please do keep in mind that our kitchens handle various ingredients, so we can't 100% guarantee against any traces of gluten. 

In any case, we are always here to answer any further questions about specific meals or assist with any other concerns you might have. 

Once again, we appreciate your support and look forward to serving you soon with delicious and gluten-friendly options!

Kind regards,
TastyBytes Support Team

I recently visited your Not the Wurst Hot Dogs truck in Manchester and ordered a New York Dog. Unfortunately, I found a piece of plastic in my food. I wanted to bring this to your attention as it's a serious health and safety issue. 

Please let me know how you plan to address this issue. 

Best regards, 
John Doe
SUPPORT_RESPONSE:
Hello John Doe,

I am sincerely sorry to hear that your dining experience at our Not the Wurst Hot Dogs truck in Manchester was less than satisfying. Your health and safety are of utmost importance to us and your feedback allows us to rectify our mistakes and improve our service.

Your complaint has been formally recorded and the appropriate actions will be taken to address this issue with utmost urgency. In addition, I would like to offer you a full refund for your New York Dog order.

Await a separate message from us where you can enter your payment details securely for the refund process to go underway. 

We appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention and we assure you that we will do everything necessary to prevent this from happening in the future. 

Thank you for your patience and understanding in this matter, John Doe.

Warm regards,
Customer Support at TastyBytes

SUBJECT: Missing Item in My Order from Guac n' Roll in London
BODY:
Hello Tasty Bytes Support, 

I recently visited the Guac n' Roll food truck in London and ordered the Fish Burrito. However, when I received my order, I noticed that the guacamole was missing. I love your food trucks and visit them frequently, but this was quite disappointing. 

Could you please look into this issue and ensure that it doesn't happen again? I would also appreciate a refund or a voucher for my next visit as a gesture of goodwill. 

Thank you for your attention to this matter. 

Best regards, 
Jane Doe
SUPPORT_RESPONSE:
Hello Jane Doe,

Thank you very much for reaching out and providing your valuable feedback about your recent visit to our Guac n' Roll food truck in London. I'm really sorry to hear about your experience with the Fish Burrito, it is definitely not the experience we want our customers to have.

The inclusion of all components, like the guacamole in this case, in our meals is very important to us and we apologize for this oversight. We're taking your feedback very seriously and will work closely with our London teams to ensure better quality control and prevent anything like this from happening again in the future.

Regarding your request for a refund, I'm pleased to inform you that we will be issuing a refund for your Fish Burrito. You'll receive a separate message shortly with the details about the refund process.

Thank you once again for letting us know about this, Jane. Please continue to bring any concerns you have, your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve our service.

Best Regards, 

TastyBytes Customer Support.
